properties.displayName: Accounts who remotely logged on the computer "Computer01.contoso.com" (replace with your own computer name)
properties.query: search in (SecurityEvent) EventID == 4624 and (LogonTypeName == "3 - Network" or LogonTypeName == "10 - RemoteInteractive") and Computer == "Computer01.contoso.com" | summarize RemoteLogonCount = count() by Account
